channel.title: Dessert on Logan Rosentreter
channel.description: Recent content in Dessert on Logan Rosentreter

item.title: Babe Ruth Bars
item.description:
15 minutes | 12 servings

Ingredients link

  • 1 cup sugar

  • 1 cup corn syrup

  • 1.5 cup peanut butter

  • 4 cup rice crispies

  • 1 cup chocolate chips

  • 1 cup butterscotch chips

Steps link

  1. bring to a boil the sugar and corn syrup

    • I think you have to cook it slowly or else it burns and the rice crispies are built like bricks

  2. add peanut butter and rice crispies

  3. press into 9x13 pan

item.title: Peanut Butter Pie
item.description:
20 minutes | 6 servings

Ingredients link

  • .5 cup peanut butter
  • .5 cup powdered sugar
  • 1 block cream cheese
  • 1 container cool whip
  • 1 graham cracker crust

Steps link

  1. throw in bowl and blend it
  2. refrigerate it
